body_html:
Hey, No, unfortunately I already made the change from tf.strided_slice to tf.slice, so I don’t think it’s that.  Do you have any other suggestions? I really appreciate the help! Are you saying you used version 0.12.0 instead of 0.12.1? Because that would be helpful and I can just use that version perhaps. All the best, John From: Rudraksh Tuwani <notifications@github.com> Reply-To: tensorflow/tensorflow <reply@reply.github.com> Date: Monday, January 23, 2017 at 9:16 AM To: tensorflow/tensorflow <tensorflow@noreply.github.com> Cc: John Larkin <john@johnjlarkin.com>, Comment <comment@noreply.github.com> Subject: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] ptb_rnn_lm.py error:tensorflow.python.framework.errors.InvalidArgumentError: logits and labels must have the same first dimension, got logits shape [400,10000] and labels shape [420] (#6469) Using code from 0.12 master branch fixed it for me. I think it is something to do with replacing. tf.strided_slice with tf.slice.
On 23-Jan-2017 7:35 PM, "John Larkin" ***@***.***> wrote: Did anyone figure out a fix for this? I am also having the mismatches shape issue, off by 420 to 400. Thanks so much! — You are receiving this because you commented. body_text:
Hey,



No, unfortunately I already made the change from tf.strided_slice to tf.slice, so I don’t think it’s that.  Do you have any other suggestions? I really appreciate the help!



Are you saying you used version 0.12.0 instead of 0.12.1? Because that would be helpful and I can just use that version perhaps.



All the best,

John



From: Rudraksh Tuwani <notifications@github.com>
Reply-To: tensorflow/tensorflow <reply@reply.github.com>
Date: Monday, January 23, 2017 at 9:16 AM
To: tensorflow/tensorflow <tensorflow@noreply.github.com>
Cc: John Larkin <john@johnjlarkin.com>, Comment <comment@noreply.github.com>
Subject: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] ptb_rnn_lm.py error:tensorflow.python.framework.errors.InvalidArgumentError: logits and labels must have the same first dimension, got logits shape [400,10000] and labels shape [420] (#6469)



Using code from 0.12 master branch fixed it for me.

I think it is something to do with replacing. tf.strided_slice with
tf.slice.
On 23-Jan-2017 7:35 PM, "John Larkin" ***@***.***> wrote:
 Did anyone figure out a fix for this? I am also having the mismatches
 shape issue, off by 420 to 400. Thanks so much!

body:
Hey, 

 

No, unfortunately I already made the change from tf.strided_slice to tf.slice, so I don’t think it’s that.  Do you have any other suggestions? I really appreciate the help! 

 

Are you saying you used version 0.12.0 instead of 0.12.1? Because that would be helpful and I can just use that version perhaps. 

 

All the best,

John

 

From: Rudraksh Tuwani <notifications@github.com>
Reply-To: tensorflow/tensorflow <reply@reply.github.com>
Date: Monday, January 23, 2017 at 9:16 AM
To: tensorflow/tensorflow <tensorflow@noreply.github.com>
Cc: John Larkin <john@johnjlarkin.com>, Comment <comment@noreply.github.com>
Subject: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] ptb_rnn_lm.py error:tensorflow.python.framework.errors.InvalidArgumentError: logits and labels must have the same first dimension, got logits shape [400,10000] and labels shape [420] (#6469)

 

Using code from 0.12 master branch fixed it for me.

I think it is something to do with replacing. tf.strided_slice with
tf.slice.

On 23-Jan-2017 7:35 PM, "John Larkin" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Did anyone figure out a fix for this? I am also having the mismatches
> shape issue, off by 420 to 400. Thanks so much!
